gnu.crypto.sasl.srp
Class KDF

java.lang.Object
  gnu.crypto.sasl.srp.KDF
public class KDF
extends java.lang.Object

The SASL-SRP KDF implementation, which is also used, depending on how it was instantiated, as a secure Pseudo Random Number Generator.

Version:
$Revision: 1.4 $
